title: CAT A & CAT B Fit Out Design
subtitle: Expert CAT A and CAT B fit out design services for transforming commercial spaces into functional workspaces, from basic shell to bespoke customization.
description: In commercial real estate, CAT A and CAT B fit out designs define the two main stages of transforming a bare building interior into a functional workspace.
CAT A represents the basic shell condition provided by the landlord, including essential structural elements, basic services, and minimal finishes.
CAT B encompasses the bespoke customization undertaken by the tenant to create a fully operational and branded workspace tailored to their specific needs.
Our comprehensive fit out design services cover both categories, ensuring seamless integration of architectural, MEP, and interior design elements.
benefits: Cost-efficient phased approach to fit out
Faster project delivery and reduced disruption

services.title: CAT A Shell Design
services.description: Design basic building shells with essential infrastructure and minimal finishes.

services.title: CAT B Interior Design
services.description: Create bespoke interior layouts and finishes tailored to tenant requirements.

services.title: MEP Integration
services.description: Seamlessly integrate mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems into fit out designs.

services.title: Lighting Design
services.description: Design efficient and aesthetically pleasing lighting solutions for workspaces.

services.title: Furniture & FF&E
services.description: Specify and coordinate furniture, fixtures, and equipment for complete workspace solutions.

services.title: Project Management
services.description: Oversee the entire fit out process from design to completion, ensuring quality and timelines.

cta.title: Transform Your Commercial Space Today
cta.description: Contact us to discuss how our CAT A and CAT B fit out design services can create the perfect workspace for your business.
